nodes.text: ZA-99 Mine was a floating explosive miniprobe model used during the war against Zakuul. Alirra Semhess used several ZA-99 Mines while fighting off intruders on the X7-Cratus space station.
ZA-99 Mines appear in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne during the final boss fight of the "Trial and Error" Uprising.
